messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Geraldo Just Had a piece on Unschooling
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for the information.  We have a local radio personality in Orlando, that is always making nasty references to homeschooling.  He probably has never
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for the information. We have a local radio personality in Orlando, that is always making nasty references to homeschooling. He probably has never heard of unschooling and as he is so negative I hope he never does. I wish people would get an education on things before they bad mouth it.

That's why I joined this page! So I could learn more about unschooling! And I can say that you all are great! I find with unschooling, my son is learning MORE and we've only just begun....

Homeschlfor2@... wrote:
It wasnt bad but it wasnt great either... I was disappointed with the catch
phrase at the bottome of the screen Unschooling = Unbelievable. The mom the
chatted with had a 6 yr old which is great but I have yet to see anything
on older kids. Pat Farenga was interviewed which I was glad he made the point
that homeschooling/unschooling your kids shouldnt be just because of schools
being unsafe anyhow I guess im kinda rambling Oh the other big peice that
bugged me was at the end the reporter gave the info that ANYONE who is
thinking of homeschooling should contact their states Dept of Education to get the
right permission..... Geraldo at Large is on Fox if anyone wants to look for
it it was on here in the Chicago area at 4:30 its on later in different
areas.

Chrissy

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

It wasnt bad but it wasnt great either... I was disappointed with the catch
phrase at the bottome of the screen Unschooling = Unbelievable. The mom the
chatted with had a 6 yr old which is great but I have yet to see anything
on older kids. Pat Farenga was interviewed which I was glad he made the point
that homeschooling/unschooling your kids shouldnt be just because of schools
being unsafe anyhow I guess im kinda rambling Oh the other big peice that
bugged me was at the end the reporter gave the info that ANYONE who is
thinking of homeschooling should contact their states Dept of Education to get the
right permission..... Geraldo at Large is on Fox if anyone wants to look for
it it was on here in the Chicago area at 4:30 its on later in different
areas.

Chrissy
